name: MAC Address to Manufacturer
description: MAC Address Lookup to find the hardware manufacturer and its postal address of a specific MAC Address

api_methods.name: maclookup
api_methods.description: Enter MAC Address (string) to find the manufacturer. MAC Formats Allowed: ('xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx', 'xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx', 'xxxx.xxxx.xxxx', 'xxxxxxxxxxxx')

parameters.name: mac_number
parameters.description: MAC Address Number to Find Manufacturer

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me the manufacturer of the device with MAC address 00-1A-2B-3C-4D-5E?
I need to find out who made the hardware with MAC 11:22:33:44:55:66.
What's the manufacturer for the MAC address 1234.5678.9abc?
Could you look up the company for the MAC address 001122334455?
Find the manufacturer for the MAC address 66-77-88-99-AA-BB.
Who is the manufacturer of the device with MAC 22:33:44:55:66:77?
I need the manufacturer details for MAC address 3344.5566.7788.
Can you find out the company for MAC 112233445566?
Please look up the manufacturer for the MAC address 99-AA-BB-CC-DD-EE.
What company is associated with the MAC address 44:55:66:77:88:99?
